name: AFGLocomotive
comment: Base class for locomotives, choo choo!

methods.name: GetMultipleUnitRole
methods.comment:
Get the role for this locomotive when MUing.
@see EMultipleUnitControl.

methods.name: CanSetTrainMultipleUnitMaster
methods.comment: @return true if we can set the multiple unit master on locomotive without forcing; false if we cannot.

methods.name: SetMultipleUnitControlMaster
methods.comment:
@param force Force this to be the master, sets any current master to slave.
@return true on success; false if there is another master and this was not forced.

methods.name: ClearMultipleUnitControlMaster
methods.comment:
Clears this vehicle as the MU master.
Returns the train to MU disabled until another one is set as master.

methods.name: GetPowerInfo
methods.comment: Get the power info about this train. If it runs on electricity.

methods.name: SetPowerConsumption
methods.comment: Used by the movement component to control the power usage.

methods.name: OnNameChanged
methods.comment: Called when the name of the train this locomotive is part of has changed name

properties.name: VehicleMovementComponentName
properties.comment: Name of the VehicleMovement. Use this name if you want to use a different class (with ObjectInitializer.SetDefaultSubobjectClass).

properties.name: mPowerConsumption
properties.comment: The power consumption of this electric locomotive, min is idle power consumption and max is power consumption at maximum torque.

properties.name: mSlidingShoe
properties.comment: The sliding shoe making contact with the third rail.

properties.name: mPowerInfo
properties.comment: The power info for this train, draw power from the circuit.

properties.name: mReplicatedMovementTransform
properties.comment: @todo Replace when proper physics simulations are done.
